trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded"></xref> event or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueNeeded"></xref>事件或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValuePushed"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use this delegate to implement virtual mode in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此委托用于实现中的虚拟模式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
